p: Dorema spp. has diuretic and emmenagogic properties, therefore, it has been used as a treatment for dysuria and as an abortifacient agent [ 52, 54, 55]. Dorema preparations have also been reported to be useful for nephrolith and cystolith [ 52, 57]. Some ITM scientists have recommended it as a remedy for the hardness of testicles and orchitis as well [ 52].
